Help:Node.title: Command Usage: write
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: write on [object] "[Text]"
EXAMPLE: write on scroll "I have heard of a plot against the Queen!"
Writes text on an object. This is currently only usable with scrolls. If you "write" on a scroll authored by someone else, you will erase everything. If you "write" on a scroll containing things you've written, you will add to the text.
SEE ALSO: address, erase, read, write
SEE TOPICS: courier
